title: Free skins
body: Hi I am a Ocianic Player in lol have seen recently that there are some free skins i am missing out on can any one who plays on oceanic server who knows the codes / ways to get them please let me know thanks

replies.body:
there are a few skins available for free, this includes riot girl Tristana, unchained Alistar, and Dreadknight  Garen. To unlock them (in the order i said) simply go to the LoL facebook page https://www.facebook.com/LeagueOfLegendsOceania/app_174961479209942 and do as prompted.  At this point, oce is unable to obtain unchained Alistar (to my current knowledge) without being a pain to Riot. Dreadknight Garen is simply obtained by following these instructions... http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/community/promotion/come-and-join-us-social-media. hope i helped.
Also note, all of the champions are unlocked when you obtain the skins ^, so don't buy them beforehand.
The Ali skin isn't directly available on OCE, but if you put a support ticket in, riot will usually just give it to you if you cite it being one of the social media skins

"At this point, oce is unable to obtain unchained Alistar (to my current knowledge) without being a pain to Riot" by this i meant doing as you suggested. I can understand why you'd want to do it but simply, if i were at riot, i'd get annoyed seeing all of these messages saying the same thing over and over for every new player. But with this being said, go for it. a free skin is still a free skin (plus the champ). :)
